title: L< D1+ ADC serious to compete

embed.description: Sloth Gaming (SG) Is an organization/team dedicated to League of legends. Goal is to expand e-sports in OCE & also be the top team in the region.

body:
Looking for an D1+ ADC ASAP for up coming tournaments - We play sun - thurs most weeks anywhere from 6pm-12pm. Preferably from NZ but not essential. Contact me via our site/ email: sgraoul016@gmail.com / add me in game SG Raoul

cheers

Raoul

replies.body:
> Looking for an D1+ ADC ASAP for up coming tournaments - We play sun - thurs most weeks anywhere from 6pm-12pm. Preferably from NZ but not essential. Contact me via our site/ email: sgraoul016@gmail.com / add me in game SG Raoul
>

lol, hmu XD
